items.content_html: Database-Engine is a lightweight, straightforward database management system designed to provide basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations. This project aims to offer an easy-to-use, minimalistic database solution for small applications and learning purposes.
items.title: saeedAlobidi/Database-Engine: Database-Engine is a lightweight, straightforward database management system designed to provide basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations. This project aims to offer an easy-to-use, minimalistic database solution for small applications and learning purposes.
